attribution: Adapted with permission from UCLES, AS Level Additional Physics, June 1989, Paper 1, Question 1
title: Trapdoor

children.value:
A uniform rectangular trap door of mass 
$\vari{m}$
 is hinged at one of its ends. It is held open making an angle 
$\quantity{\theta }{60$^{\circ }$}$
 to the horizontal with a force of magnitude 
$\vari{F}$
 at the open end acting perpendicular to the trap door. Find an expression for 
$\vari{F}$
 and find the value of 
$\vari{\tan {\varphi }}$
, where 
$\vari{\varphi }$
 is the angle made by the line of action of the reaction force at the hinge above the horizontal.
